description: Query all recovery loans (loan_status = R) from PostgreSQL. Computes days_since_origination from the origination_date so the decision engine can apply numeric rules without date parsing.

config.query: SELECT loan_number, borrower_name, co_borrower_name, property_address, city, state, zip_code, current_balance, origination_date, statute_of_limitations, (CURRENT_DATE - origination_date)::INTEGER AS days_since_origination FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'R' ORDER BY loan_number
